item.title: JD Vance: "Crypto finally has a champion" in the White House
item.description: Vice President JD Vance spoke at the Bitcoin 2025 Conference in Las Vegas, as the Trump administration has leaned into cryptocurrency.

item.title: Can Trump give Harvard's funding to trade schools? It's not that easy
item.description: President Trump wants to divert federal funds from Harvard to trade schools. But experts say the process isn't that simple.

item.title: Trump to pardon reality TV stars Todd and Julie Chrisley
item.description: "Your parents are going to be free and clean," President Trump told the couple's children in a phone call.
